actions.committee: House Committee on Post Office and Civil Service
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Post Office and Civil Service.

committees.committee: House Post Office and Civil Service

official_title: A bill to amend title 5, United States Code, to restore the survivor annuities of certain remarried spouses whose remarriages have terminated.

summary.text: Restores civil service survivor annuities to remarried spouses whose remarriages terminated, and whose survivor annuity was terminated on or before July 18, 1966.

titles.title: A bill to amend title 5, United States Code, to restore the survivor annuities of certain remarried spouses whose remarriages have terminated.
